mapper.select: select count(id) as bet_count,sum(bet_amount) as betamount,sum(valid_bet_amount) as validamount,sum(net_amount) as winlose from ds_ag_hunter

SELECT if(COUNT(1)>0,230001,NULL) as gameType,if(COUNT(1)>0,'捕鱼王',NULL) as gameName, if(COUNT(1)>0,count(1),NULL) bet_count, SUM(d.bet_amount) betamount, SUM(d.net_amount) winlose, SUM(d.valid_bet_amount) validamount FROM ds_ag_hunter d

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d') bet_time,COUNT(1) bet_count, SUM(d.bet_amount) betamount, SUM(d.net_amount) winlose, SUM(d.valid_bet_amount) validamount FROM ds_ag_hunter d
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
